thread.title: Shanghai to build Lingang as smart manufacturing hub (Shanghai Municipal Government)
thread.title_full: Shanghai to build Lingang as smart manufacturing hub (Shanghai Municipal Government) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Shanghai to build Lingang as smart manufacturing hub (Shanghai Municipal Government)
text: ( Source : Shanghai Municipal Government ) Shanghai will offer 5 billion yuan (US$788 million) to fund smart manufacturing and build up its Lingang port area as a leading base for high-end manufacturers, officials told a media conference
